mutants.code:
def calculate_encryption_code(A, p):
    n = len(A)
    s = sum(A)
    mx = 1
    t = 0
    for i in range(n - 1):
        t += A[i]
        x = t % p + (s - t) % p
        mx = max(mx, x)
    return mx

        x = t % p + (s - t) % p

def calculate_encryption_code(A, p):
    n = len(A)
    s = sum(A)
    mx = 0
    t = 0
    for i in range(n - 1):
        t += A[i]
        x = t % p + s * t % p
        mx = max(mx, x)
    return mx
